mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.defualt_device AS "defualtDevice", u.office_id AS "office.id", f.name AS "office.name", u.name AS "name", u.login_name AS "loginName", u.phone AS "phone", u.mobile AS "mobile", a.police_phone_code AS "policePhoneCode", a.interphone_code AS "interPhoneCode", a.action_recorder_code AS "actionRecoderCode" FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN bph_user_extend a ON u.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_office f ON u.office_id = f.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bph_user_extend ( id, user_id, police_phone_code, action_recorder_code, interphone_code, defualt_device, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{policePhoneCode}, #{actionRecoderCode}, #{interPhoneCode}, #{defualtDevice}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bph_user_extend SET police_phone_code = #{policePhoneCode}, action_recorder_code = #{actionRecoderCode}, interphone_code = #{interPhoneCode}, defualt_device = #{defualtDevice}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
